welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Takoma Park, the charming city known for its vibrant community, beautiful parks, and rich history. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines, JetBlue Airways, Southwest Airlines, and more.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at BWI airport serves as the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at BWI airport offers a variety of shops, restaurants, and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at BWI airport is primarily used for Southwest Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at BWI airport serves as the main hub for Spirit Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lee Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'LeeAirportWiFi' from their device's list of available networks.
